6: Bicycle is a human-powered, pedal-driven, two-wheeled vehicle, having a one wheel at the front and a large wheel at the back. Bicycles have been around since the early 19th century and have since evolved into a symbol for transportation, freedom, health and fitness.
7: Bicycle is a vehicle that has two wheels and one seat. Basic, but revolutionary: The bicycle was the first real success story of industrial production.
8: Cycling is a great way to get the heart pumping and get some fresh air. Feel the wind in your face and take in the sights with a bicycle ride.
9: Bicycle brings your love of cycling to new heights. It’s like you’re floating in air, yet never losing contact with the ground. Revel in flawless all-day comfort that adapts to different terrain for the ride of your life.
10: Bicycling is the best way to get around, stay fit and healthy, reduce pollution and traffic congestion, improve local economies, especially in low-income neighborhoods. It's a fun way to explore your city or nature by bike.
11: Bicycle is a quality brand that has been trusted for over a hundred years. Known for their high-quality bicycles, we are proud to sell this product and hope you enjoy it as much we do.
